Interface IPlayerManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerManager

    public interface IPlayerManager

      java.util.Collection<IBetterPlayer> getPlayers()
      Get all better players online over the network.

      Get all better players online over the network that matches a specific predicate.
      long getSlots()
      Get cached slot count.
      long getSlots(long refreshMilliseconds)
      Get slot count with an offset period of data refresh.
      void updatePlayerCount()
      Update cached player count over the network It iterates over all working proxies in the same environment, so please don't use it when it's not necessary to know the current exact count of players
      void updateSlots()
      Update slot count over the network

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayers

        java.util.Collection<IBetterPlayer> getPlayers(java.util.function.Predicate<IBetterPlayer> predicate)
        Get all better players online over the network that matches a specific predicate.
        Parameters:
        predicate - predicate
        Returns:
        collection of unique IBetterPlayer objects

      • getPlayers

        java.util.Collection<IBetterPlayer> getPlayers()
        Get all better players online over the network.
        Returns:
        collection of unique IBetterPlayer objects

      • getPlayer

        IBetterPlayer getPlayer(net.md_5.bungee.api.connection.ProxiedPlayer player)
        Get online player from his attached proxied player instance. Returns null if the player is not online over the network.
        Parameters:
        player - proxied player
        Returns:
        IBetterPlayer or null

      • getPlayer

        IBetterPlayer getPlayer(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Get online player from its unique id. Returns null if the player is not online over the network.
        Parameters:
        uuid - uuid player's unique id
        Returns:
        IBetterPlayer or null

      • getPlayer

        IBetterPlayer getPlayer(java.lang.String username)
        Get online player from username. Returns null if the player is not online over the network.
        Parameters:
        username - player username
        Returns:
        IBetterPlayer or null

      • updatePlayerCount

        void updatePlayerCount()
        Update cached player count over the network It iterates over all working proxies in the same environment, so please don't use it when it's not necessary to know the current exact count of players

      • updateSlots

        void updateSlots()
        Update slot count over the network

      • getPlayerCount

        long getPlayerCount()
        Get cached player count. It doesn't refresh player count.
        Returns:
        new player count

      • getPlayerCount

        long getPlayerCount(long refreshMilliseconds)
        Get player count with an offset period of data refresh. For example, if you set the value to 500 milliseconds and the method is being called every 120ms, player count will be refreshed every ~4.16 call to this method (500/120)
        Parameters:
        refreshMilliseconds - refresh rate in milliseconds
        Returns:
        current player count (cached or live, depending if it has been refreshed)

      • getSlots

        long getSlots()
        Get cached slot count. It doesn't refresh slot count.
        Returns:
        new slot count

      • getSlots

        long getSlots(long refreshMilliseconds)
        Get slot count with an offset period of data refresh. For example, if you set the value to 500 milliseconds and the method is being called every 120ms, slot count will be refreshed every ~4.16 call to this method (500/120)
        Parameters:
        refreshMilliseconds - refresh rate in milliseconds
        Returns:
        current slot count (cached or live, depending if it has been refreshed)
